2. Amphetamine: This is also a chemical entity. It is a potent central nervous system stimulant that is used in the treatment of attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, narcolepsy, and obesity.
3. Cocaine: This is a chemical entity. It is a strong stimulant most frequently used as a recreational drug. It is also used in medical applications as a local anesthetic for some surgeries.
